L_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Hérésie d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Horus
boardgame.description: From publisher website:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In the Horus Heresy board game, the most legendary battle in the history of the Warhammer 40,000 universe unfolds across the razed plains of Terra and in the frozen orbit above. Deadly fighting ranges from the Emperor_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s golden Inner Palace to Horus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s flagship, the Vengeful Spirit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Taking the side of traitor or loyalist, two players control either fearless Space Marine legions or deviant Chaos Space Marines, mighty Titans, Imperial Armies both loyal and traitorous, and a fearsome array of other units, including the Emperor and Horus themselves._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;An innovative order and initiative system forces each side to carefully consider the commands they issue to their troops. A dramatic, card-driven combat system incorporates escalating damage, gives players the opportunity to allocate resources between attack and defense, and brings to bear the unique special powers of each unit type, from fortification-destroying Titans to the perverse daemons of Chaos._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This legendary tale of treachery and heroism is brought to vibrant life with over one hundred magnificent sculpted plastic playing pieces. The stunning three-dimensional map of Terra brilliantly portrays the landscape immediately surrounding the Imperial Palace, from the magma-filled crevasses to the fortifications that offer the Imperial player protection against both enemy assault and orbital bombardments._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each one of these structures, as well as the Imperial Palace itself, have been expertly sculpted, and rise above the landscape to create a truly immersive experience. The fortifications of Terra have never looked more formidable! Once the board is set up with playing pieces and terrain for your first game, it will be a wonder to behold._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Horus Heresy includes six scenarios that differ in both difficulty and style. The first scenario, titled Brother Against Brother, is recommended for all new players as it provides predetermined starting locations for both player's forces. It is a well balanced version of the Battle for Terra, and also presents a roughly historical recreation of the conflict's events._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Horus Heresy is a board game that pits two players against each other to recreate the most famous battle of Warhammer 40,000_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s rich history, in which the Warmaster Horus_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s betrayal of the Emperor comes to its climax. Taking the side of either traitor or loyalist, players control a fearsome array of units, including the Emperor and Horus themselves. Brother fights brother, and the universe hangs in the balance!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Not to be confused with Horus Heresy (1993), the original 1993 Games Workshop game of the same name._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG GW02) On the thirteenth day of Secundus, the bombardment began... In the greatest betrayal the universe has ever known, the Warmaster Horus - once humanity’s greatest general, now corrupted by Chaos - has turned against the Emperor and hurled the Imperium of Man into ferocious civil war. The galactic conflict has risen to its climax. The Warmaster’s ruinous legions have assaulted Holy Terra itself, the Emperor’s seat. Here the fate of humanity hangs in the balance during the greatest military campaign ever seen. In the Horus Heresy board game, this legendary battle unfolds across the razed plains of Terra and in the frozen orbit above. Deadly fighting ranges from the Emperor’s golden Inner Palace to Horus’s flagship, the Vengeful Spirit. Taking the side of either traitor or loyalist, two players control either fearless Space Marine legions or deviant Chaos Space Marines, mighty Titans, Imperial Armies both loyal and traitorous, and a fearsome array of other units, including the Emperor and Horus themselves. An innovative order and initiative system forces each side to carefully consider the commands they issue to their troops. A dramatic, card driven combat system incorporates escalating damage, gives players the opportunity to allocate resources between attack and defense, and brings to bear the unique special powers of each unit type, from fortification-destroying Titans to the perverse daemons of Chaos. Brother fights brother, and the universe hangs in the balance! Horus Heresy includes over 120 detailed miniature models including 10 plastic terrain pieces, and more than 200 cards to bring this sweeping conflict to life on a stunning map of the war-torn Terra.

Here the fate of humanity hangs in the balance during the greatest military campaign ever seen. In the Horus Heresy board game, this legendary battle unfolds across the razed plains of Terra and in the frozen orbit above. Deadly fighting ranges from the Emperor’s golden Inner Palace to Horus’s flagship, the Vengeful Spirit. Taking the side of either traitor or loyalist, two players control either fearless Space Marine legions or deviant Chaos Space Marines, mighty Titans, Imperial Armies both loyal and traitorous, and a fearsome array of other units, including the Emperor and Horus themselves. An innovative order and initiative system forces each side to carefully consider the commands they issue to their troops. A dramatic, card driven combat system incorporates escalating damage, gives players the opportunity to allocate resources between attack and defense, and brings to bear the unique special powers of each unit type, from fortification-destroying Titans to the perverse daemons of Chaos. Brother fights brother, and the universe hangs in the balance! Horus Heresy includes over 120 detailed miniature models including 10 plastic terrain pieces, and more than 200 cards to bring this sweeping conflict to life on a stunning map of the war-torn Terra.

Brother fights brother, and the universe hangs in the balance! Horus Heresy includes over 120 detailed miniature models including 10 plastic terrain pieces, and more than 200 cards to bring this sweeping conflict to life on a stunning map of the war-torn Terra.

We over-ordered Horus Heresy, so now I have 3 extra copies that would like to find good gamer homes. I can either ship via USPS Priority @ $25.00 or USPS Parcel Post @ $15.00 - your choice! USPS Insurance will cost an extra $2.25. PA sales require an additional 6% sales tax. I will certainly look to combine and lessen shipping costs for multiple copies if we can. Let me know if you want more than one copy and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll create additional marketplace items just for you so that BGG get_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s their cut!

This game has only been played a couple of times and is in great condition. There is even a replacement board from FFG due to the board warping. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a coffin box game so there is some minor shelf wear and a few minor imperfections in the box. Nothing major and nothing you can really see with your eye. I accept paypal payments only. I will ship upon receipt of payment. This is a large game. Shipping will be via UPS or Fed Ex Ground at my discretion. Shipping will be $15.00 due to the size and weight.
Opened but never played. Produce still on the sprues.

Game is in great condition. All pieces and game components and rules in fantastic condition. Has only been played once. This is a game that will not get played much. I am looking for a good home. Thanks.

English edition, very ood conidtion, only played twice. All components are present. Shipping will be € 6,90 to Germany or € 17 to the rest of Europe via DHL, insurance included. Payment wither via PayPal or (international) bank transfer.
Item reserved for Jim Horvath (Killing Joke)
Never played, complete, still has some items remaining to be punched. Please inquire with shipping cost estimates as this is a pretty heavy game. Buyer to play actual shipping costs, nothing more.
Played once.

Prefer pickup in Sydney as it is quite a big box. Will investigate postage to Australia if somebody really wants it. In very good condition - only played a couple of times but its time to down size now (and its a big box). I have checked every single piece of the game is present and in good condition. The only thing of note is that the game came with one too many Khorne (Red) Chaos Cultists and one too few Khorne Chaos Warband. This is not a problem as the two sculpts look almost identical anyway, you normally just use the rank on the bases (which are separate to the sculpt) to differentiate all the cultists from warband anyway (and the game did come with the correct number of bases). So I never bothered to contact FFG to get another Chaos Warband figure. I do however have the proof of purchase token which should allow you to do that if you choose to.

Description: In the greatest betrayal the universe has ever known, the Warmaster Horus, once humanity’s greatest general and now corrupted by Chaos, has turned against the Emperor and hurled the Imperium of Man into ferocious civil war. The galactic conflict has risen to its climax and the fate of humanity hangs in the balance during the greatest military campaign ever seen. In the Horus Heresy board game, this legendary battle unfolds across the razed plains of Terra and in the frozen orbit above. Deadly fighting ranges from the Emperor’s golden Inner Palace to Horus’s flagship, the Vengeful Spirit. Taking the side of either traitor or loyalist, two players may control fearless Space Marine legions or deviant Chaos Space Marines, mighty Titans, Imperial Armies, both loyal and traitorous and a fearsome array of other units, including the Emperor and Horus themselves. The innovative order and initiative system of Horus Heresy forces each side to carefully consider the commands they issue to their troops. A dramatic, card driven combat system incorporates escalating damage, gives players the opportunity to allocate resources between attack and defense, and brings to bear the unique special powers of each unit type, from fortification-destroying Titans to the perverse daemons of Chaos. Brother fights brother, and the universe hangs in the balance! Horus Heresy includes over 120 detailed miniature models, including 10 plastic terrain pieces and more than 200 cards bringing this sweeping conflict to life on a stunning map of war-torn Terra.
Not to be confused with Horus Heresy, the original 1993 Games Workshop game of the same name. **************************** Our Philosophy: We are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s that simple. In business for over 5 years, we understand the most critical aspects of ecommerce. Deliver good value, keep you posted on that status of your order and be available for help should the need arise. Description: All games are new and still in factory shrink-wrap. How to place an Order? Via the BoardGameGeek “shopping cart” Note: If this is your first purchase on BoardGameGeek, Go to http://boardgamegeek.com/wiki/page/Marketplace_Buyer_Guide for more information. Payment: Payment via PayPal “Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com” (PayPal Verified) Shipping: Griffin’s Toy Chest ships via USPS (2-3 day service) or Fed-Ex Ground (2-5 business days) to anywhere within the United States. You will receive a price quote for each shipping option and you choose which of these two shipping option best fits your needs. All shipments are made within 2-3 days of receiving your cleared PayPal payment. Note: feel free to combine items to reduce shipping cost. Returns: Our return policy mirrors our philosophy; we are not satisfied unless you are satisfied! You may return any unopened item within 30 days of delivery for a full refund of the purchase price less shipping costs. Simply contact us to make return arrangements. Note: if an item is damaged in transit, an item exchange will be made at no additional cost to the buyer. Note that we take special pains to package all of your items properly but in the event of the unforeseen, we have you covered!
Contact: Please contact us via email: Griffin@GriffinsToyChest.com: phone (M-F 9 AM -6PM EST) 1-888-228-3716; or mail: Griffins Toy Chest, P.O. Box 13731, Fairlawn, OH 44313

Ich verkaufe hier das Brettspiel _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Horus Heresy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; aus dem Warhammer 40.000-Universum. Das Spiel ist für 2 Spieler und besticht durch sein hervorragendes Spielsystem und hochwertige Komponenten (Figuren, Spielbrett, Karten, etc.). Das Spiel ist komplett in Deutsch. Das Spiel und die Komponeten sind in absolut neuwertigem Zustand, lediglich der Karton weist geringe Lagerstellen auf (siehe Fotos). Das Spiel wurde nur 2mal zu beruflichen Testzwecken gespielt und wurde in einem Nichtraucherhaushalt aufbewahrt. Die Spielfiguren wurden in extra Kunststoffboxen aufbewahrt um Beschädigungen vorzubeugen. Weitere Informationen über das Spiel kann man hier erhalten: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/63543/horus-heresy Selbstabholung möglich (Bornheim NRW). Alternativ biete ich den versicherten Versand per Hermes für 5,89€ an. Privatverkauf, keine Garantie, keine Gewährleistung, keine Rücknahme. For International/Europe purchase _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; shipping, please ask before you buy.
Biete Horus Heresy das Brettspiel an. Das Spiel ist in einem guten Zustand. Zahlung per Banküberweisung oder Paypal (zzgl. Paypal Gebühren) möglich, zzgl. Versandkosten.
